entry.title: Display keys value in droplist
entry.content:

【image】Service Contract item category selection value

Please let me know where to set this.

Soma

entry.title: Best Practice for data transfer between EPLAN and SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
entry.content:
Seek the expert advice about the Best Practice for data transfer between EPLAN and SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.

I saw "SAP Engineering Control Center Interface to EPLAN, private cloud edition", but I can't find "SAP Engineering Control Center Interface to EPLAN, public cloud edition".

Can SAP Integration Suite, starter edition help, or do we need SAP Integration Suite, standard edition? Do we have any reference case that data successfully transferred between EPLAN and SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition? 

The customer's existing ECC is integrated with EPLAN, and now the customer needs to implement SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, which is to follow their head quarter management team's guidance.

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition的专业服务订单 App的J11的服务订单类型是否可以做成销售订单BOM往服务订单发原材料
entry.content:
SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition的专业服务订单 App的J11的服务订单类型是否可以做成销售订单BOM往服务订单发原材料？

具体说明：专业服务订单APP是否支持将 物料以直接模仿销售订单BOM形式 服务订单里挂？

服务订单含料、工、费。计划把服务订单的一级物料为虚拟物料号，下一级用原材料往这个订单发料，订单只显示虚拟物料号。然后人工和费用用Activity type 挂进服务订单。

entry.title: Automatic Profitability Segment Derivation in "Post General Journal Entries" App
entry.content:
Is there any way in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition to automatically derive a profitability segment when posting via the Post General Journal Entries app?

Currently, even when we define custom substitution/validation rules, the system requires us to first manually press "Assign Profitability Segment", and only after that, upon entering the required prerequisite values, the system performs the derivation via the "Derive" button.

Is there any way to bypass this manual process and have the system:

  • automatically derive the profitability segment,

  • without needing to manually assign and trigger derivation?

We are looking for a way to have profitability segments derived seamlessly as part of the journal entry process.

entry.title: Change Master Template for PO Print with Adobe Designer
entry.content:
Hi sap,

I want to change the PO print template, I need to add some texts in the Master template. Like add a company name beneath the logo, and add some Legal provisions in one page.

My question is, I downloaded and open the master template with adobe designer, but I found 6 master pages: one empty master page,  Landscape_Factsheet,Landscape_ItemList,Portrait_Factsheet,Portrait_ItemList,Portrait_outboundLetter. So which one should I add the TEXTS? or all pages?

entry.title: 生产订单TECO之后系统如何设置禁止后续的投料,报工,入库操作
entry.content:
Hi SAP,

      目前我们的SAP 公有云系统中存在生产订单TECO后还能够对其进行发料或报工或收货操作.我们希望能有办法禁止这种操作,查阅资料发现OP版本能够在生产订单抬头状态参数文件中进行控制,我想问一下Cloud版本是否也能像OP版本一样可以控制,谢谢!

entry.title: Withholding tax for customer invoice in Italy #COE#RFL01
entry.content:
Hello,

I work for an Italian company that already have withholding tax for supplier invoice. But recently they have been asking to manage withholding for customer invoices.

I checked the SCCUI but I didn’t have access to SCCUI 104408 who make links between a condition type and the withholding type.

After checking document “SSCUI_List_EN_XX.xlsm”, I can see that SCCUI 104408 is not available for Italy.

So, I deduce that SAP is not compliant with withholding tax for customer invoice in Italy.

But as it is a legal obligation, I think there are some workarounds.

Have you some information or feedback about that?

Yours sincerely,

Teddy.

#COE#RFL01

now It's visible in filter options , but when I am trying to fetch data based on today's date no data is found as it doesn't contains any values.

 

I tried to add values using Custom logic app but couldn't find appropriate BADi for extension fields value substitution for maintenance planning.

 

Can you please suggest a way to input values into it.

Regards,

Habeeb Unissa

entry.title: How to mass post goods receipt with PO reference?
entry.content:
Hi experts,

We want to know how to mass post goods receipt with PO reference?

We try to use below API but failed : API_MATERIAL_DOCUMENT_SRV.

It seems that an inbound delivery must be needed if we want to post goods receipt.

But in our business, we don't need inbound delivery.

Please kindly give your advice.

 

Grace.

entry.title: In S/4 Public Edition, how to handle changes on C1 released objects?
entry.content:
Update: Incredible what the power of pure frustration can bring you. Mass handling doesn't seem to be an option, but you can change the check variant being used to exclude C1 contract checks. Whether or not that is wise to do is a different discussion, but at least there are options.

Link to a blog by Olga Dolinskaja: https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-sap/how-to-create-and-use-your-own-atc-check-variant-in-abap-development-tools/ba-p/13512135

The blogs explains how to create a custom check variant and set it as the active one. Since I want to retain most of the checks from the default, I've created a copy. Answered my own question. I'll just leave it up here in case anyone else runs into C1 contract issues 😊

The question:
Can we mass-handle C1 exemption requests (create and approve)? --> NO
Or disable the C1 contract scan on task release? --> YES

Why would we want to:
When working in a Public Cloud environment, you're bound to create some custom objects to use. CDS views for example are the bread and butter of the S/4 system. To be able to use those, they have to be released for internal use. That's where the C1 contract comes in, perfect.

A first version was moved to test, so the customer could have a look at where we're going with the development. In the meantime, development continues on the development system. However, if you then change key fields, add parameters and the likes, you break the contract. And indeed, if the object was used by multiple objects and suddenly you introduce a mandatory parameter, it would break.

To prevent this, SAP performs an ATC check on task release. Which in our case returns loads of errors, being all versions of objects we continued working on. There is only one program using these views, which is in the same transport, adjusted and well, but SAP can't assume that is the case, so slaps errors on everything.

These errors can be handled by creating an exemption request. A separate exemption for every error. This generates yet another object in the transport, in which I can explain why it's fine. Then someone else needs to approve those exemptions, you can not do that yourself. Once again, a separate approval for every request.

This being my own development, with all related objects in this transport, everything is just fine. There is no risk. That's why we would want to handle them in mass, or disable the check completely.

entry.title: MODIFY ENTITIES OF Purchase order item pricing elements (conditions)
entry.content:
Hi Team,

  I have to update the Purchase order item pricing conditions of PMPO and ZDL1 to ZDL4 ( discount level in a bulk through RAP ABAP. I am using this statement by collecting all PO items pricing conditions in  lt_update1 and updating. But this statement is not updating for multiple POs but updates for single PO. Could you please provide your suggestions .
MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_purchaseordertp_2
ENTITY purorderitempricingelement
UPDATE FROM lt_update1
FAILED DATA(ls_failed1)
MAPPED DATA(ls_mapped)
REPORTED DATA(ls_reported1).

Could you please clarify below queries.

1. Please let me know if failed records of all Purchase orders will be collected in 'FAILED DATA'. 

2. Will the successful purchase order update will be rolled back if any one of the purchase order has any errors i,e will we able to update all POs only if there is no error POs?

Thanks & Regards,

Rajeswari

entry.title: Tax Reporting Date is not editable for most countries in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello,

In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, VAT reporting is based on the Tax Reporting Date (technocal field VATDATE), which determines the period in which a transaction is reported for VAT purposes. For countries like Poland and Slovakia, SAP allows manual editing of the Tax Reporting Date on posted journal entries. 

Is there any possibility to edit this field for other countries – e.g. France or Germany? Sometimes, when a user initially assigns the tax reporting date incorrectly, there is no way to change it except for reversal and posting new document. 

REMARK: We do not have 5XU license.

entry.title: Default Component Operation Assignment in Production Orders
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We are working with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition and have a question regarding the default assignment of Bill of Material (BOM) components to operations when a production order is created.

When we create a production order, the system automatically assigns all BOM components to the first operation (e.g., 0010) in the production order's component overview.

We need the system to automatically default these components to a later operation (e.g., 0020), instead of always defaulting to the initial operation.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.
